name: Carrot Cake Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Our apologies to the other carrot cakes out there but take one bite of our gluten free Carrot Cake, and it will be your go-to from now on. Light, decadent, fluffy, and moist, our gluten free baking mix makes it easy to create show-stopping cakes, cupcakes, and muffins â€” even for beginner bakers!
